html:
Nov 1 (Reuters) - Rivian Automotive Inc RIVN.O:: *RIVIAN AUTOMOTIVE INC - IT IS CURRENTLY ESTIMATED THAT INITIAL PUBLIC OFFERING PRICE WILL BE BETWEEN $57.00 AND $62.00 PER SHARE *RIVIAN AUTOMOTIVE INC - SEES OFFERING 135 MILLION SHARES OF CLASS A COMMON STOCK IN IPO *RIVIAN AUTOMOTIVE - GRANTED TO UNDERWRITERS OPTION FOR PERIOD OF UP TO 30 DAYS TO PURCHASE UP TO ADDITIONAL 20.3 MILLION SHARES OF CLASS A COMMON STOCK *RIVIAN - FOLLOWING IPO COMPLETION, AFFILIATES OF ROBERT SCARINGE TO HOLD COMMON STOCK REPRESENTING ABOUT 8.9% OF VOTING POWER OF OUTSTANDING CAPITAL STOCK *RIVIAN- AT CO REQUEST,UNDERWRITERS HAVE RESERVED UP TO 7.0% OF SHARES OFFERED BY CO IN OFFERING, FOR SALE AT IPO PRICE THROUGH DIRECTED SHARE PROGRAM *RIVIAN - CORNERSTONE INVESTORS HAVE INDICATED INTEREST IN PURCHASING UP TO $5.0 BILLION OF SHARES OF CLASS A COMMON STOCK IN OFFERING AT IPO PRICE


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 01-NOV-202120:05:00.387 GMT
